# John Owolabi - Personal Website

> John Owolabi runs Saturn Star Movers in Canada and builds software projects spanning logistics, real estate data, automation, and tools that help people make faster, clearer decisions.

This is the personal website of John Owolabi, featuring his blog posts (called "Thoughts"), projects, and professional information.

## Site Structure

- [Home](https://johnowolabi.com/): Bio, latest posts, projects, and links
- [Thoughts](https://johnowolabi.com/thoughts.html): Blog listing page with all published essays
- [Individual Post](https://johnowolabi.com/post.html?slug={slug}): Individual blog posts

## About the Author

John Owolabi is a founder and software developer based in Canada. He operates Saturn Star Movers, a moving company, and builds software tools for the logistics and real estate industries.

### Projects

- Saturn Star Movers (https://starmovers.ca) - A moving company in Canada
- Sold2Move (https://sold2move.com) - Real-time real estate listing tracker for movers
- MovSense (https://movsense.com) - Automation software for moving companies

## Blog Content

The blog contains personal essays on life, entrepreneurship, human nature, and observations. Topics include:

- Personal reflections and life philosophy
- Business and entrepreneurship insights
- Human behavior and relationships
- Technology and innovation critique
- Nigerian-Canadian immigrant experience

## Content Access

- All blog content is stored at: /posts.json
- The posts.json file contains all published essays with title, date, excerpt, content (HTML), and slug
- Individual posts are accessible via: /post.html?slug={post-slug}

## For More Details

- [Full content for LLMs](https://johnowolabi.com/llms-full.txt): Complete blog content in plain text format

## Contact

- Email: johnowolabi80@gmail.com
- Twitter: @johnowolabi_
- Instagram: @johnowolabi_
